questions.question: Which of these transformers does not have group-related parameters for improving performance?
Which step should generally be first to improve performance when working with transformers?
Under what condition does the Process When Group Changes (Advanced) setting in group-based transformers improve performance?
options: Features are geographically sorted using a nearest neighbor method
Features are less than 1 mb each
Features are pre-sorted into their groups
Features are sorted by a universally unique identifier (UUID)

questions.question: You can improve the performance of some transformers by controlling which features arrive "first" and setting a parameter to inform the transformer to expect this behavior. How do you control which features arrive first?
options: Reader order (first reader is read first and so on)
Transformer order (transformers alphabetically processed by name)
Writer order (first writer is written first and so on)

questions.question: Your workspace should remove unneeded attributes and geometry as late as possible.
What's the most basic way to take advantage of bulk mode performance improvements?
options: Bulk mode does not improve performance
Enable bulk mode on each transformer manually
Use the newest version of FME and upgrade your transformers in older workspaces.
